# Technology Stack

The team used the tools and technologies shown below while working on the project.

## Server

[![DigitalOcean](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?style=for-the-badge&logo=digitalocean&label=DigitalOcean&message=droplet&color=0080FF)](https://www.digitalocean.com/products/droplets/)  
[![Docker](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?style=for-the-badge&logo=docker&label=Docker&message=v20.10.9&color=2496ED)](https://docker.com)  
[![Apache](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?style=for-the-badge&logo=apache&label=Apache&message=v2.4.46&color=D22128)](https://httpd.apache.org)

## Backend

[![Ionic](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?style=for-the-badge&logo=springboot&label=Spring+Boot&message=v2.4.4&color=6DB33F)](https://spring.io/projects/spring-boot)  
[![Angular](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?style=for-the-badge&logo=java&label=Java&message=v11.0.11&color=007396)](https://java.com)  
[![Hibernate](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?style=for-the-badge&logo=hibernate&label=Hibernate&message=v5.4.29&color=59666C)](https://hibernate.org/orm)  
[![PostgreSQL](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?style=for-the-badge&logo=postgresql&label=PostgreSQL&message=v13.4&color=4169E1&logoColor=white)](https://postgresql.org)  
[![Keycloak](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/png;base64,&label=Keycloak&message=v13.0.1&color=428bca)](https://www.keycloak.org/)
